name: Susan M. WILSON v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Singing Needles/William Carter Company. Appeal of SINGING NEEDLES/WILLIAM CARTER COMPANY
name_abbreviation: Wilson v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Susan M. WILSON v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Singing Needles/William Carter Company. Appeal of SINGING NEEDLES/WILLIAM CARTER COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
This appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Harry W. Reed, Jr., Lebanon, for appellant.
Christopher S. Underhill, Lancaster, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
525 A.2d 1194
Susan M. WILSON v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD and Singing Needles/William Carter Company. Appeal of SINGING NEEDLES/WILLIAM CARTER COMPANY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1987.
Decided May 22, 1987.
Harry W. Reed, Jr., Lebanon, for appellant.
Christopher S. Underhill, Lancaster, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
